name: Renewable energy technologies; income tax credit
text: §241-4.6  Renewable energy technologies; income tax credit.  The renewable energy technologies income tax credit provided under section 235-12.5 shall be operative for this chapter for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2002; provided that the system was installed after June 30, 2003. [L 1991, c 99, §2; am L 2004, c 97, §2]
